articles.author: Evelyn Leckie, Stacey Pestrin, Shari Hams
articles.title: Wild storm leaves tens of thousands of South Australian properties without power, SES clean-up continues - ABC News
articles.description: Work to repair damage caused by wild storms which hit South Australia and left tens of thousands of properties without power is ongoing. Authorities have asked for interstate crews to assist, but warn some areas will not see electricity restored until Tuesday.
articles.content:
The clean-up continues across South Australia after wild storms swept through the state yesterday, cutting power to about 160,000 customers. 
<ul><li>Some South Australians will be without power unt… [+5032 chars]

articles.title: Life on Mars? Australian rocks may hold clues for Nasa rover - BBC
articles.description: Scientists study ancient Australian rocks to devise ways to look for life's traces on the Red Planet.
articles.content:
Rocks in the Australian Outback dating back 3.5 billion years may help scientists work out whether there has ever been life on Mars.
